overview: Dr. Ayman Mousa is DandanaCafe executive and vice president of his own business. Mousa is responsible for DandanaCafe overall business line strategy, food service, hookah business, import/export policies and all business systems. Mousa earned his Ph.D. in information and Technology in engineering from the Phoenix University, South Orange County (2003), and also holds BSCS in computer science (1998); MSSE in software engineering (2000); Mousa, has been offering 20+ years of experience driving Information Technology projects to success by pursuing business alignment and strategically maximizing the value of IT resources. Approaches IT governance through full-circle management (ï±), which includes examining projects from a business value perspective and a technical perspective, eliminating the disconnect between IT and business that can delay projects and cost companies money. This approach incorporates appraising stakeholders of the project scope, effects and consequences to business, changes to work process, and implications to employees.
